description_zh: 基于 WebRTC 数据通信服务创建实时多人在线游戏。
description_en: Create real-time multiplayer online games using WebRTC DataChannels.

conditions.description_zh: 检测玩家是否为当前房间的主机(Host)。
conditions.description_en: True if host of the current room.

conditions.description_zh: 当任意玩家连接到服务器时触发。(包括主机，或连接主机的其他玩家)
conditions.description_en: Triggered when connected to a peer (either to host or a peer joining the host).

conditions.description_zh: 与对等设备断开连接时触发（从主机或对等设备离开主机）。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when disconnected from a peer (either from host or a peer leaving the host).

conditions.description_zh: 当玩家与主机断开连接时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when a peer gets disconnected from the host.

conditions.description_zh: 从房间踢出时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when kicked from a room.

conditions.description_zh: 收到其他玩家发送的包含特定标签消息时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when received a message with a specific tag from a peer.

conditions.description_zh: 收到玩家发送的任意消息时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when received any message from a peer.

conditions.description_zh: 收到玩家的二进制消息时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when received a binary message from a peer.

conditions.description_zh: 比较当前房间内的玩家人数。
conditions.description_en: Compare the number of peers currently in the room.

conditions.description_zh: 向主机发送新的客户端状态时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when sending the new client state to the host.

conditions.description_zh: 检测是否已准备好向主机发送输入事件。 在此结果完成前不要移动本地玩家。
conditions.description_en: True when ready to send input to the host. Don't move the local player until this is true.

conditions.description_zh: 服务器列表或信令服务器发生错误时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered if an error occurs with the server list or signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 信令成功连接服务器时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when successfully connected to the signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 信令连接服务器失败时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when disconnected from the signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 信令成功登录服务器时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when successfully logged in to the signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 信令加入房间时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered upon successfully joining a room.

conditions.description_zh: 信令离开房间时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered upon successfully leaving a room.

conditions.description_zh: 检测是否已连接信令服务器。
conditions.description_en: True if currently connected to a signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 检测是否已登录信令服务器。
conditions.description_en: True if currently logged in to a signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 检测当前是否已进入信号服务器上的房间。
conditions.description_en: True if currently in a room on the signalling server.

conditions.description_zh: 执行 '请求游戏大厅列表' 动作后，收到服务器返回的游戏大厅列表时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered after 'Request game instance list' when the list has been received from the server.

conditions.description_zh: 执行 '请求房间列表' 动作后，收到服务器返回的房间列表时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered after 'Request room list' when the list has been received from the server.

conditions.description_zh: 监听指定标签的各种二进制传输事件时触发，例如传输完成、开始接收或被取消。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when various binary transfer events happen like a receive starting, or cancellation, for a specific transfer.

conditions.description_zh: 监听任意二进制传输事件的触发，例如任意传输完成、开始接收或被取消。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when various binary transfer events happen like a receive starting, or cancellation, for any transfer.

conditions.description_zh: 当带有特定标签的二进制数据传输成功时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when a binary transfer with a specific tag has successfully been received.

conditions.description_zh: 当任意二进制数据传输完成时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when any binary transfer has successfully been received.

actions.description_zh: 断开与房间的连接。若主机离开则房间内所有玩家都将被踢出。
actions.description_en: Disconnect from peers in the current room, and also leave the room on the signalling server.

actions.description_zh: 向指定的玩家发送消息。
actions.description_en: Send a message to a specific peer.

actions.description_zh: 发送二进制数据给指定玩家。
actions.description_en: Send binary data to a specific peer.

actions.description_zh: 模拟发送与接收消息时产生的延迟和数据丢失的过程。用于在本地的房主端测试，模拟遇到现实中的网络延迟时可能出现的影响。
actions.description_en: Simulate a delay and packet loss in sending/receiving messages. Useful for testing lag performance locally.

actions.description_zh: 通过网络自动同步对象类型。
actions.description_en: Automatically synchronise an object type over the network.

actions.description_zh: 添加同步对象的实例变量以通过网络同步。
actions.description_en: Add a synced object's instance variable to also sync over the network.

actions.description_zh: 将实例对象与已连接的玩家关联。玩家离开房间时，对应的实例对象也会销毁。
actions.description_en: Indicate an object which represents a connected peer.

actions.description_zh: 向主机注册一个值，用于表示玩家本地的输入状态，并通过标签来指示不同的输入。
actions.description_en: Add a value to send to the host representing the client input state.

actions.description_zh: 加入房间前设置，设置宽带配置为互联网(Internet)或局域网(LAN) 模式。
actions.description_en: Before joining a room, set Internet or LAN mode to adapt the use of the network.

internet-30-hz-updates-80ms-buffer.zh: 互联网 (30Hz 更新, 80ms 缓冲)

lan-60-hz-updates-40ms-buffer.zh: 局域网 (60Hz 更新, 40ms 缓冲)

actions.description_zh: 通过主机向房间中的所有玩家发送消息。
actions.description_en: Send a message from the host to every peer in the room.

actions.description_zh: 强制将玩家从房间中移除。仅主机使用有效。
actions.description_en: Forcibly remove a peer from the room when host.

actions.description_zh: 设置玩家的本地输入状态，用于向主机指示它们的控制器。
actions.description_en: Set the client input state for a peer to indicate to the host their controls.

actions.description_zh: 为代表本地玩家的对象启用本地输入预测。
actions.description_en: Enable local input prediction for an object representing the local player.

actions.description_zh: 连接信令服务器，用于加入房间。
actions.description_en: Connect to a signalling server to be able to join rooms.

actions.description_zh: 从当前的信令服务器断开连接。
actions.description_en: Disconnect from the current signalling server.

actions.description_zh: 添加另一个ICE服务器以帮助建立连接。 内置了几个默认值。
actions.description_en: Add another ICE server to help establish connectivity. Several defaults are built-in.

actions.description_zh: 与信令服务器连接后，可登录信令服务器。
actions.description_en: Once connected, log in to the signalling server with an alias.

actions.description_zh: 登录信令服务器后，加入房间即可与其他玩家会面。
actions.description_en: Once logged in, join a room to meet other peers.

actions.description_zh: 向信令服务器请求离开当前房间。
actions.description_en: Request to leave the current room on the signalling server. Peer connections are not affected.

actions.description_zh: 请求当前服务器上，活跃的游戏大厅。
actions.description_en: Request the list of game instances currently on the server.

actions.description_zh: 自动加入第一个未满员的房间。
actions.description_en: Join the first room which is not full.

actions.description_zh: 从当前服务器中，获取指定的游戏大厅的房间列表。
actions.description_en: Request the list of rooms in a game instance currently on the server.

actions.description_zh: 将二进制数据对象的内容传输给对方。
actions.description_en: Transfer the content of a Binary Data object to a peer.

actions.description_zh: 取消包含指定标签的二进制数据传输任务。
actions.description_en: Cancel an active binary data transfer.

expressions.description_zh: 获取当前可用的游戏大厅数量。
expressions.description_en: The number of game instances available.

expressions.description_zh: 索引处的游戏大厅的名称。
expressions.description_en: The name of a game instance at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 索引中游戏大厅中的人数。
expressions.description_en: The total number of peers in a game instance at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 返回的房间数量。
expressions.description_en: The number of rooms returned.

expressions.description_zh: 索引中房间的名称。
expressions.description_en: The name of a room at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 获取指定房间中的玩家数量。
expressions.description_en: The total number of peers in a room at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 列表索引的房间最多容纳的人数。
expressions.description_en: The maximum number of peers for a room at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 在 '接收房间列表' 条件中，获取索引位置的房间状态。返回 available(可用),  locked(锁定),  full(已满)。
expressions.description_en: The room state at an index (""available"", ""locked"" or ""full"").

expressions.description_zh: 在触发器中，相关的玩家ID。
expressions.description_en: The ID of relevant peer in a trigger.

expressions.description_zh: 在触发器中，相关的玩家昵称。
expressions.description_en: The alias of relevant peer in a trigger.

expressions.description_zh: 房间主机的ID
expressions.description_en: The ID of the room host.

expressions.description_zh: 房间主机的别名
expressions.description_en: The alias of the room host.

expressions.description_zh: 收到消息时，接收到的内容。
expressions.description_en: The message received in a message trigger.

expressions.description_zh: 收到消息或数据时，获取此事件的标签。
expressions.description_en: The tag of the message or binary transfer in a trigger.

expressions.description_zh: 收到消息时，消息发送方的用户ID
expressions.description_en: The ID of the user the message is from in a message trigger.

expressions.description_zh: 收到消息时，消息发送方的用户昵称。
expressions.description_en: The alias of the user the message is from in a message trigger.

expressions.description_zh: 获取指定的玩家昵称。
expressions.description_en: Get a peer's alias for a given peer ID.

expressions.description_zh: 通过昵称获取玩家ID。
expressions.description_en: Get a peer's ID from their alias.

expressions.description_zh: 获取玩家的网络延迟，即与主机的 Ping 值。主机可获取所有玩家的延迟，而玩家只能获取主机的延迟。
expressions.description_en: Get the latency (ping time) for a peer.

expressions.description_zh: 获取玩家的网络丢包延迟，用于确定网络连接的稳定性。即最大延迟与最小延迟的时间差(PDV)。如最大延迟是20毫秒，最小延迟为5毫秒，那么网络波动就是15毫秒。
expressions.description_en: Get the packet delay variation for a peer.

expressions.description_zh: 当前房间已连接的玩家数量。
expressions.description_en: The number of connected peers in the current room.

expressions.description_zh: 在 '玩家断开连接' 条件中，获取玩家离开的原因。
expressions.description_en: In 'On peer disconnected', the leave reason if known.

expressions.description_zh: 获取房间中第n个玩家的ID。
expressions.description_en: The ID of the nth connected peer in the room.

expressions.description_zh: 获取房间中第n个玩家的昵称。
expressions.description_en: The alias of the nth connected peer in the room.

expressions.description_zh: 作为主机时，获取对手客户端的输入状态。
expressions.description_en: When host, get the client input state of a peer.

expressions.description_zh: 获取在其他玩家视角中，目标玩家当前的X坐标。
expressions.description_en: The X position of a moving peer as it appears to another peer.

expressions.description_zh: 获取在其他玩家视角中，目标玩家当前的Y坐标。
expressions.description_en: The Y position of a moving peer as it appears to another peer.

expressions.description_zh: 获取在其他玩家的视角中，目标玩家当前的角度。
expressions.description_en: The angle of a moving peer as it appears to another peer.

expressions.description_zh: 获取信令服务器的地址。
expressions.description_en: The URL of the current signalling server.

expressions.description_zh: 获取信令服务器的版本。
expressions.description_en: The version of the current signalling server.

expressions.description_zh: 获取信令服务器的名称。
expressions.description_en: The name of the current signalling server.

expressions.description_zh: 获取信令服务器的运营商。
expressions.description_en: The operator of the current signalling server.

expressions.description_zh: 在 '信令连接成功' 条件中，获取信令服务器的 '每日消息' (MOTD) 内容。
expressions.description_en: The 'message of the day' for the current signalling server.

expressions.description_zh: 当前用户的个人昵称。
expressions.description_en: The alias for the current user.

expressions.description_zh: 当前已加入的游戏名称。
expressions.description_en: The current game name joined.

expressions.description_zh: 当前已加入的游戏实例。
expressions.description_en: The current game instance joined.

expressions.description_zh: 当前已加入的游戏房间。
expressions.description_en: The current room joined.

expressions.description_zh: 在 '信令发生错误' 条件中，返回的错误消息。
expressions.description_en: In 'on signalling error', the error message.

expressions.description_zh: 当前用户的ID
expressions.description_en: The ID for the current user.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒出站的信息数量。
expressions.description_en: Number of outbound messages per second.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒上传数据，以字节每秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: Network uploaded bytes per second.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒发送的解压缩数据的大小。
expressions.description_en: Decompressed data sent in bytes per second.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒入站的信息数量。
expressions.description_en: Number of inbound messages per second.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒下载数据，以字节每秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: Network downloaded bytes per second.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒接收到的解压缩数据的大小。
expressions.description_en: Decompressed data received in bytes per second.

expressions.description_zh: 用于测试目的。对于主机的视角，预测客户端的输入误差X。
expressions.description_en: Client-side input prediction X error from host, for debugging.

expressions.description_zh: 用于测试目的。对于主机的视角，预测客户端的输入误差Y。
expressions.description_en: Client-side input prediction Y error from host, for debugging.

expressions.description_zh: 用于测试目的。预估在玩家视角中，主机当前的X坐标。
expressions.description_en: Host X position for debugging input prediction.

expressions.description_zh: 用于测试目的。预估在玩家视角中，主机当前的Y坐标。
expressions.description_en: Host Y position for debugging input prediction.

expressions.description_zh: 可选。可指定二进制数据传输的文件名。
expressions.description_en: Filename of a binary data transfer, if specified.

expressions.description_zh: 可选。可指定二进制数据传输的 MIME 类型。
expressions.description_en: MIME type of a binary data transfer, if specified.

expressions.description_zh: 在 '传输进度更新' 条件中，获取当前的传输进度。范围在 0 - 1 之间。
expressions.description_en: In a binary transfer progress trigger, the transfer progress in the range 0-1.

expressions.description_zh: 在 '二进制传输开始' 条件中，正在传输的数据的大小，以字节为单位。
expressions.description_en: In a binary transfer start trigger, the size in bytes of the data being transmitted.
